description:
Qobuz is a music streaming and download service that offers a catalogue of over 70 million tracks in high-resolution audio (CD quality and above). It is available in over 20 countries, including the United States, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, and Japan.

      The Qobuz app is available on iOS, Android, Mac, and PC. This package contains the Application for PC.
      
      Qobuz is known for its high-quality audio. It offers two streaming quality options: Hi-Fi (16-bit/44.1kHz) and Hi-Res (24-bit/96kHz or 24-bit/192kHz). Qobuz also allows users to download music for offline listening.

      Full use of Qobuz requires subscription or purchase.
summary: Qobuz is a digital music store and streaming service, with a focus on high fidelity lossless audio.
author: Qobuz
